name: Jazzy Color
description:
This little "game" is my entry to the #JazzyColor challenge posed by Jazza in this video.

The challenge was to colour in or alter a line-art provided, but since I am not that much of an artist I decided to make a little game out of it. Type whatever you like and see your words become colors on the artwork.

ATTENTION: The game currently does not display properly on mobile, I am looking into fixing that.

Hint - There might be some little eastereggs hidden, see if you find them!
